channel.title: Telecommunication on Ex Machina
channel.description: Recent content in Telecommunication on Ex Machina

item.title: Collaborative AI
item.description: Establishing the correct model of collaboration between different profit centres can yield powerful outcomes. Many law firms have adopted the lock-step to strike a balance between agressive competitiveness and collegiate collaboration. Stock market traders have built a new system for collaboration using artificial intelligence and blockchain, that might be a model for others to follow.

item.title: FOMO and the Law
item.description: Legislators cannot predict the many ways in which laws will be put to the test. And so they load statutes with open ended clauses designed to cover precisely these instances. The Other Service Provider is one such regulation. With open-ended definitions of terms like IT Enabled Services every modern business could end up being brought within the regulatory net.
